title: The Haiku Phase
author: VD
content_html:
Billy gets a little spicy on SG:

“As soon as he finished writing 900 page books he switched to spicy one-liners. Then came his haiku phase…”

How strange, that he should happen to mention that now.

遅れた本
季節は過ぎた
ついに完成
